tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Payal is extremely thorough and end result oriented. Very talented and a guide to her patients by wanting them to even help themselves through proper dental hygiene, thereby aiming to reduce the patient's dependence on her therapy.
She was specifically called by my Dentist, Dr. Vikram Hingorani for my gum surgery to augment the fixing of my dental bridge. She was punctual, courteous and efficient.
